#### **Course description**
---

Image Processing: methods and applications in C++ using <a href="http://cimg.eu/" target="_blank"> CImg</a> library

#### **Syllabus**
---

1. Introduction to CImg
2. Spatial filtering
3. Frequency filtering
4. Diffusion filtering
5. Mathematical morphology
6. Optical flow
7. Hough transform
8. Active contours
9. Image segmentation
